Slide 8
Task 3. Identify System Models
Objective
To preliminary specify the application from
•An external perspective
Systems involved and their limits
•A structural perspective
By modelling the structure of the information 
processed
Technique
To build system model using a set of templates taking into 
account
•Identified use cases
•Application characteristics
Basic Symbols                                   Relationships
...
System Models Templates Catalogue
•Includes 11 system models templates
